scripts.css-compile: node-sass --include-path node_modules/bootstrap/scss --include-path node_modules/swiper/src --output-style expanded --precision 6 scss/template.scss css/template.css
scripts.css-minify: node-sass --include-path node_modules/bootstrap/scss --include-path node_modules/swiper/src --output-style compressed --precision 6 scss/template.scss css/template.min.css
scripts.js-concat: concat -o js/template.js node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/util.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/tooltip.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/button.js node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/collapse.js js/fa-build.js node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/js/fontawesome.js node_modules/featherlight/release/featherlight.min.js node_modules/swiper/dist/js/swiper.js js/custom.js
scripts.watch-js: nodemon --ignore scss/ --ignore js/fa-build.js --ignore js/template.js -e js -x "npm run js"
